definition: to conspire with sb/to plot/a conspirator/a partner in crime/an accomplice
to discuss matters of vital importance
large scale program of lasting importance/project of paramount importance/to think big/annual national audit
to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
to collude with/to collaborate with/to gang up with
villains collude together (idiom); to work hand in glove with sb (to nefarious ends)
to form an alliance/to ally oneself with/allied with/aligned/to bond with
to make a suggestion/to state (one's views, ideas etc)/suggestion/advice/idea
to make a profit/to gain/to get an advantage
